content.title: Still Have Questions? Let's Clear Them Up.
content.description: Whether You're Wondering About Job Prospects, Salary, Or Market Demand, Or If You're Even The "Right Type" Of Candidate — These Are The Questions We Hear Most Often From Future Students Like You.

salary.question: What Kind Of Salary Can I Expect After Completing The Program?
salary.answer: Marketing Operations professionals typically earn between £45k-£75k in their first role, with senior positions reaching £90k+. Our graduates have secured roles at companies like Google, Salesforce, and various high-growth startups.

demand.question: Is There Really Demand For Marketing Operations Roles?
demand.answer: Absolutely. Marketing Operations is one of the fastest-growing roles in tech, with demand increasing 35% year-over-year. Companies desperately need professionals who can bridge marketing strategy and technology execution.

background.question: I Don't Have A Tech Or Marketing Background — Can I Still Join?
background.answer: Yes! Our program is designed for career changers. We start with fundamentals and build up your skills progressively. Many successful graduates came from completely different industries like retail, finance, and healthcare.

tools.question: What Tools Will I Learn Inside The Program?
tools.answer: You'll get hands-on experience with industry-standard platforms including Marketo, HubSpot, Salesforce, Pardot, and various analytics tools. We focus on the tools most in-demand by employers.

jobHelp.question: Will You Help Me Find A Job After The Program?
jobHelp.answer: Absolutely. Our career support includes CV optimization, LinkedIn profile enhancement, interview preparation, portfolio development, and direct introductions to our hiring partner network.

ai.question: How Is AI Changing Marketing Operations — And Why Does That Matter For Me?
ai.answer: AI is enhancing Marketing Operations, not replacing it. We teach you how to leverage AI tools for automation, personalization, and data analysis, making you more valuable and future-proof in your career.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We created MarTech Mastery to bridge the gap between marketing theory and real-world execution. Everything we do is built to get you hired — hands-on experience with in-demand MarTech tools.

training.title: Training the Next Generation of  Marketing Ops Pros
training.description: The MarTech Mastery Program was created by marketing consultants who've worked with global brands like Google, Stripe, and Adobe. We're here to make sure you gain practical, in-demand skills — fast.
training.careerPromise: Your Fast-Track to a £65k+ Career. See How MarTech Mastery Makes It Possible!
training.videoCaption: Discover how MarTech Mastery can fast-track your career to £65k+

experts.title: Built by Experts. Designed for Your  Career Leap.
experts.description: We're not just another online course — MarTech Mastery was created by real marketing operations professionals who've worked with companies like Google, Stripe, and Canva. Our mission: help people like you transition confidently into high-paying MarTech roles with hands-on experience, expert mentoring, and career support.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Marketing is evolving fast — from email and CRM to full-funnel automation, AI personalization, and RevOps. But there's a gap: companies need pros who can bridge marketing creativity with tech know-how. That's where you come in.
mission.paragraph2: We started MarTech Mastery to train the next wave of Marketing Ops professionals — people ready to work with tools like HubSpot, Marketo, and Salesforce and contribute real value from day one.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: MarTech Mastery was born inside the consulting trenches. Our founders have spent over a decade building automation systems for billion-dollar startups, Fortune 500 brands, and scale-ups across Europe, the U.S., and Africa.
story.paragraph2: In every role, one thing stood out: the talent gap. There weren't enough hands-on, boot-savvy marketers who could implement, not just ideate. So we built a program that teaches exactly what we wish we had when we started out.
